frequency.label: Frequency
frequency.description: Select how frequently this connection will pull data from the asset

time.label: Time (UTC)
time.description: Set the UTC time to run connector to pull data from data source

host.label: Management IP address or hostname
host.description: Specify the IP address or  hostname of the data source so that IBM Cloud Pak for Security can communicate with it

port.label: Host port
port.description: Set the port number that is associated with the hostname or IP address

client_id.label: Client ID
client_id.description: Unique identifier of CrowdStrike API. It can be found in the API client table in the Falcon console

client_secret.label: Client secret
client_secret.description: Secret code of CrowdStrike API client. It can be found while creating a API client in Falcon console
